ul.li: The elements of civil architecture, according to Vitruvius and other ancients, and the most approved practice of modern authors especially Palladio / by Henry Aldrich, D.D. formerly dean of Christ Church ; translated by Philip Smyth, LL.B. Fellow of the New College.
